**EXISTING STRUCTURES**

No structures have been created by the agent in the given steps. This section will be updated as the agent progresses and constructs structures on the map.

**ERROR TIPS**

No errors were recorded in the given steps. This section will be updated with tips as errors occur in future steps.

**NAMESPACE**

No utility functions or important variables have been defined by the agent in the given steps. This section will be updated as the agent defines utility functions or assigns important variables.
